data.actual_result: The "Expire After" becomes 30 Minutes (Which is not default)
data.expected_result: The "Expire After" would be 24 hours (which is default)
data.short_description: By default invite link doesn't expire in 24 hours if re-generated after generating a permanent invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel setttings tab, create an invite (which will stay for 24 hours by default) - Then create a permanent invite. - Then untick the "Set this link to never expire" - Then click on the gear icon on the create invite menu and then create an invite.
